title: PeopleStrategy to Exhibit at 2015 HR Technology Conference & Expo
text:
Atlanta-based provider of Human Capital Management solutions will offer live demonstrations of its Enterprise HCM Suite
(PRWEB) October 15, 2015
PeopleStrategy, Inc.® a leading Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) provider of end-to-end Human Capital Management (HCM) solutions, will be exhibiting at the 2015 HR Technology Conference and Exposition from October 18 – October 20 at the Mandalay Bay in Las Vegas. Conference attendees can get a free demonstration of the company’s enterprise HCM Suite, PeopleStrategy eHCM.
“PeopleStrategy is focused on delivering solutions and service that will earn us Clients for Life®. We work closely with our clients and partners to understand their needs and to validate the trends we observe in the marketplace,” said David Fiacco, president and COO of PeopleStrategy. “Since last year’s Conference, we have made several enhancements to eHCM as a direct result of client and partner feedback coupled with the vision and innovation of an experienced and determined PeopleStrategy team. What better place to show off those developments than at HR Tech, the ‘can’t miss’ event of the year for HR professionals and industry leaders.”
A single, Cloud-based solution, PeopleStrategy eHCM can help employers more effectively manage the radically changing needs within their payroll, HR, benefits, workforce management and talent functions, increasing efficiency and productivity across the enterprise. PeopleStrategy eHCM also equips senior level management with access to powerful data and analytics to help identify trends within the organization; guide more proactive, business-oriented decisions and strategies; and ensure compliance with governmental regulations and requirements.
The HR Tech Expo will open the evening of Sunday, October 18 and continue through Tuesday, October 20. Attendees are encouraged to meet the PeopleStrategy team at Booth #2616 for a complementary demonstration of the eHCM Suite and to learn more about how PeopleStrategy can help solve many of the challenges associated with managing a workforce in an increasingly complex business environment.
About PeopleStrategy, Inc.
PeopleStrategy is a leading provider of enterprise Cloud-based HCM solutions that enable employers to more effectively manage their Talent Acquisition, HCM, Payroll, Benefits, Workforce Management and Performance Management processes. PeopleStrategy’s eHCM solution suite empowers the entire organization through self-service and mobile access, reducing administrative costs and providing more time to focus on a company’s people strategy. What’s your people strategy? Learn more at @PeopleStrategy or visit us at http://www.peoplestrategy.com .
